comments.body: i have a upgraded ps4 that's pretty powerful and it says its not meeting the requirements.It has upgraded ram, cpu, storage, and upgraded hardware.And to begin with its a ps4 pro god of war edition.and i did some test to see how powerful my ps4 was so i got all the experimental option which had a warning sign that the game might crash but i ignore it, i also activated education mode which also gave me a warning sign that might also crash but ignore.I also put one of my texture pack.I created the world and runs so smooth ended up not satisfied so i made a redstone build that spawns millions of frogs because i had 3 chest full of frog spawn eggs ands runs smoothly once again no lag until i exploded the frogs with about 50 end crystals.so that's my reason if you have a upgraded console you should be able to have ray tracing.
This will be a great change in the game!

It would be great if they could add the original controls as an option to change too, but keep what they have now as the standard to help the new players out. It would make it so the older players can have what they are used to back, while still helping the newer players understand how to play.
I agree, I personally want Pirate speak added to this version of Minecraft. I use it a lot in Java and I miss it in bedrock.
I agree and maybe add more languages like that in the same update
Bedrock deserves the fun languages! Maybe even considering localization, have more fun languages made for other major tongues.
